description: Bubbles are the absolute best. Follow this guide to learn how to make your own solution and then get out in the sun and watch your bubbles come to life
It turns out that kids love decorating and hunting for eggs any time of the year, not just during Easter!
alt: A woman and boy decorating eggs

description: This one harkens back to older days. Turns out there's a billion different creative and fun things you can do with a simple round hoop. Here's 10 of them!
Have a blast of a time while getting artistic as well. Squirt gun painting will surely bring a giant smile to the face of everyone invovled
alt: A squirt gun rests on a easel with colorful paintings
